name: MillionDollarMoneyDrop
0:
”Alexa play The Million Dollar Money Drop”
”Place one million dollars”
”Place all my money”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the million dollar money drop
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Will you beat the drop?

Check out this awesome voice adapation of the Fox TV Show hosted by Kevin Pollak

You will get to pick a category and then decide how to place your money over different options.

Here's some things you can say while playing this skill:

•'Alexa, place 1 million' - to place $1,000,000 on your answer

•'Alexa, place all my money' - to place the rest of your money on the answer

•Alexa, start again' - to clear your placements and restart the question
